definition: to live under the same roof (of different generations)

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture
Four Generations Under One Roof, novel by Lao She 老舍[Lao3 She3]
Four Generations Under One Roof, novel by Lao She 老舍[Lao3 She3]

sentences.english: The program aim to accommodate a place to leave for a four generation's family.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个四世同堂家庭的住宅。

sentences.english: They held a family party at which all three generations were present.
sentences.chinese: 他们举行了一个三代同堂的家庭聚会。

sentences.english: How are you with large families?
sentences.chinese: 你能接受几世同堂的大家庭吗？

sentences.english: His family is a nuclear family with three generations living together under one roof.
sentences.chinese: 他的家庭是三代同堂住在同一屋檐下。

sentences.english: It is a proud traditional in China to have four generations living under one roof.
sentences.chinese: 四代同堂是中国一个值得骄傲的传统习俗。

sentences.english: Back then, the multigenerational family was the norm, we sigh.
sentences.chinese: 我们感叹，“N代同堂”以前是一种基准。

sentences.english: Three generations. Where are they heading?
China no longer has families where four generations live under the same roof.
sentences.chinese: 中国现在很少再有四世同堂的大家庭了。

sentences.english: It's a story of four generations under one roof.
sentences.chinese: 讲述了一个四世同堂大家庭的生活故事。

sentences.english: Four generations were represented, from my grandmother on down to her great-grandson.
sentences.chinese: 我们四代同堂，从祖母那代开始，到她的曾孙。

sentences.english: What a big family:Four generations live under one roof.
sentences.chinese: 好大一家子》四世同堂的一家人。

definition: Four Generations Under One Roof, novel by Lao She 老舍[Lao3 She3]
three generations of a family/the three earliest dynasties (Xia, Shang and Zhou)
benevolent father, filial son (idiom)/natural love between parents and children
(children) run around parent's knees/fig. to stay to look after one's elderly parents
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people
from generation to generation/generation after generation
